directions: Whisk rice wine vinegar, olive oil, peanut butter, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, and garlic together in a bowl to make a smooth dressing.
Toss red cabbage, apples, and onion in a large salad bowl and pour dressing over slaw; toss to coat. Chill before serving.
ingredients: 2 Braeburn or Fuji apples - peeled, cored, and finely diced
title: Purple Apple Slaw with Peanut Butter Dressing
